products.name: Nomad Cans - 10L
products.description: Durable portable container for mobile operations. Lightweight and efficient for small-scale farmers.

details.summary: Nomad Cans are patented, insulated food-grade containers designed for the safe transport of milk. Built for modular use with Ice Water Dispensers (IWD) or mobile trikes, these cans maintain optimal temperature using a chilled glycol thermocore insert.
specs: Cooling Method: External contact with chilled glycol water inside thermocore
Material: Food-grade Aluminium, HDPE cladding, double-insulated body
Use Cases: On-farm cooling, decentralized collection, pre-cooled storage
benefits: Integrated Cooling: Solar-powered ecosystem; no external refrigeration needed
Sustainability: Carbon-neutral cooling vs. diesel refrigeration
Operational: Reduced spoilage; improved reliability over long distances

products.name: Nomad Cans - 25L
products.description: Perfect balance between capacity and portability for medium-scale farm operations.

details.summary: The Nomad Cans 25L provides mid-range capacity for farm cooperatives and larger dairy operations. Its enhanced thermal insulation maintains milk quality during medium-distance transport.

products.name: Nomad Cans - 50L
products.description: High-capacity portable container for bulk operations. Industrial-grade construction for durability.

details.summary: The Nomad Cans 50L is engineered for large cooperatives and commercial dairy operations. Its premium thermal insulation and high capacity make it ideal for long-distance milk transport while maintaining quality and minimizing losses.

products.name: IWD Ice Water Dispenser
products.description: Solar-powered chilled water for farms and communities. Improves produce preservation and ensured low food spoilage .

details.summary: This is a digitally controlled, solar-powered chilling system that produces and stores food-grade glycol-cooled water. This chilled water is used to cool milk, fish, and other perishables through closed-loop cold packs (ladder packs or thermocores).

products.name: Eco-Sav Thermal Bags
products.description: Durable thermal bags for temperature-sensitive product transport. Reusable and environmentally friendly.

details.summary: EcoSav Bags are durable, insulated carry packs designed for transporting fish and produce in cooled conditions. Used together with ladder packs filled with chilled glycol water from Ice Water Dispensers, they preserve freshness, reduce spoilage, and deliver high-quality products to market.
specs: Cooling Medium: Glycol ice ladder packs

products.name: MaziwaPlus Dairy Management System
products.description: Comprehensive dairy management platform with real-time tracking, financial management, and market linkages.

details.summary: MaziwaPlus DMS is a cloud-based, mobile-integrated platform for real-time monitoring, route management, and digital records across the dairy supply chain. It connects milk transporters, processors, quality officers, and administrators into a single, traceable ecosystem.

products.name: MaziwaPlus Prechillers 300-1000L
products.description: Efficiently cools and stores milk with hybrid power options. Customizable from 300-1000L capacity.

products.name: MaziwaPlus Prechillers Pro 200-2000L
products.description: Premium features for large farms and milk collection centers. Enhanced efficiency with smart monitoring and analytics.

products.name: BMC Hybrid Milk Cooler
products.description: Versatile hybrid system combining solar and grid power. Perfect for inconsistent solar areas.

details.summary: Designed for cooperative hubs and milk collection centers, Bulk Milk Chillers rapidly chill and store large volumes of milk, safeguarding quality from farm to processor. Powered by solar with hybrid backup options, they provide dependable, hygienic bulk milk handling in off-grid or grid-limited areas.

products.name: BMC Solar Milk Cooler
products.description: Pure solar cooling with battery storage. Ideal for off-grid locations with maximum sustainability.

products.name: Eco-Sav Pasteurizer 100-500L
products.description: Professional milk pasteurization system powered by solar. Extends shelf life and meets safety standards.

products.name: Eco-Sav Solar Dryer
products.description: Professional-grade solar dryer for grains, herbs, and produce. Extend storage life and add premium market value.
